post_text: a case of molestation of a foreign tourist woman has come to light in jaipur rajasthan delhi commission for women dcw chief swati maliwal shared the video on twitter demanding action against the accused he sent the video to chief minister ashok gehlot and the rajasthan police and demanded immediate attention to the matter police started the investigation after the video went viral although the incident location is unknown sindhi camp police station has been given the instruction to investigate by the citys municipal police control room as per the viral video the accused can be seen repeatedly touching the female tourist during this the foreign woman looks very uncomfortable the woman was accompanied by a male companion who found the behaviour of the accused a bit strange the delhi commission for women chief wrote on twitter just saw this video where a man can be seen inappropriately touching a foreign tourist this is so embarrassing tagging ashok gehlot and rajasthan police for action these incidents are spoiling the name of the country source  news24 follow mewsinsta for trending news and informative carousel posts molestation harassment jaipur mews

post_text: today is internationalwomensday   the theme is inspireinclusion and weve chosen to highlight some of the issues including discrimination gender inequality and sexual harassment that we see as healthcare professionals   equality is the goal  and although progress has been made sadly we are not close to that in the healthcare profession in 2021 the bma found the following  91 of female doctors had experienced sexism in the past two years  60 of nurses said they had experienced sexual harassment at work  56 of female doctors received unwanted verbal comments relating to their gender in the last two years  its all our responsibility to lift the world that we live in to new standards  collectively as individuals groups organisations and industries we can create a gender equal world a world free of bias stereotypes and discrimination  a world thats diverse equitable and inclusive a world where difference is valued and celebrated together we can forge womens equality  equality is the goal and equity is the ticket to get there  not just for today but always   collectively its all our responsibility to raise the standard  please consider downloading the student dose podcast tackling sexism with scrubsurvivors  available on all major streaming platforms  werewithyou iwd iwd2024 equality equity harassment genderdiscimination genderequality doctors doctorsofintagram genderbias youokaydoc youokaynurse nhsworkers nhs inclusiveemployment

post_text: new york city settles a 175 million lawsuit with jamilla clark and arwa aziz two muslimamerican women who alleged police harassment   the settlement approved by district judge analisa torres includes reforms regarding the removal of religious attire during police procedures   estimated payouts for eligible claimants range from 7824 to 13125   the lawsuit filed in 2018 stemmed from the womens claim of feeling shamed and violated when officers forced them to remove their hijabs for mugshots after arrest

post_text: algerian boxer imane khelif won gold at this years paris olympics when she beat chinas yang liu in the womens welterweight final throughout this years games khelif was at the centre of a vicious dispute about her gender eligibility despite being born female not identifying as transgender or intersex and having the international olympic committee asserting her biological gender as female she was subjected to a wave of online abuse now the boxer is filing a cyberbullying lawsuit in a statement sent to variety the paris prosecutors office said it will be conducting an investigation into the counts of cyber harassment due to gender public insult because of gender public incitement to discrimination and public insult because of origin in the lawsuit jk rowling and elon musk have both been named over alleged acts of aggravated cyber harassment musk and rowling were heavily involved in the discourse around khelifs gender in one post rowling shared a picture of khelif accusing her of being a man who was enjoying the distress of a woman hes just punched in the head musk meanwhile shared a post from swimmer riley gaines that claimed men dont belong in womens sports and quoted the message by writing absolutely while the lawsuit mentions these famous figures it is actually filed against x which under french law means it was filed against unknown persons meaning anyone who may have written hateful messages can be investigated this means that donald trump could also be investigated as he took to x posting a picture from khelifs first fight saying i will keep men out of womens sports     imanekhelif boxing jkrowling elonmusk donaldtrump lawsuit cyberbullying bullying harassment paris2024 paris olympics olympics2024 sport athlete gender abuse freeda
